mapper.select:
select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.reconstruction_id , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.form_state , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.owner_dept , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_tel , t1.device_name , t1.secret_level , t1.unified_id , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.lika_date , t1.original_value , t1.existing_performance , t1.reforming_reason , t1.after_performance , t1.transform_way , t1.budget , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.net_value , t1.device_category , t1.created_by_person from assets_reconstruction_check t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.RECONSTRUCTION_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.reconstructionId}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByDept}),'%')
and t1.FORM_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.formState}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.OWNER_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerDept}),'%')
and t1.OWNER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerId}),'%')
and t1.OWNER_TEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerTel}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceName}),'%')
and t1.SECRET_LEVEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.secretLevel}),'%')
and t1.UNIFIED_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unifiedId}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_MODEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceModel}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_SPEC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceSpec}),'%')
and t1.MANUFACTURER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.manufacturerId}),'%')
and t1.LIKA_DATE >= #{bean.likaDateBegin}
and t1.LIKA_DATE <= #{bean.likaDateEnd}
and t1.ORIGINAL_VALUE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.originalValue}),'%')
and t1.EXISTING_PERFORMANCE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.existingPerformance}),'%')
and t1.REFORMING_REASON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.reformingReason}),'%')
and t1.AFTER_PERFORMANCE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.afterPerformance}),'%')
and t1.TRANSFORM_WAY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.transformWay}),'%')
and t1.BUDGET like concat(concat('%',#{bean.budget}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute03}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute04}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute05}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute06}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute07}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute08}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute09}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute10}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute11}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute12}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute13}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute14}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_15 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute15}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_16 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute16}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_17 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute17}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_18 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute18}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_19 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute19}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
and t1.NET_VALUE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.netValue}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_CATEGORY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceCategory}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_PERSON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByPerson}),'%')
and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.reconstruction_id , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.form_state , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.owner_dept , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_tel , t1.device_name , t1.secret_level , t1.unified_id , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.lika_date , t1.original_value , t1.existing_performance , t1.reforming_reason , t1.after_performance , t1.transform_way , t1.budget , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.net_value , t1.device_category , t1.created_by_person from assets_reconstruction_check t1 where t1.attribute_01 = #{pid}

select t1.id , t1.reconstruction_id , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.form_state , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.owner_dept , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_tel , t1.device_name , t1.secret_level , t1.unified_id , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.lika_date , t1.original_value , t1.existing_performance , t1.reforming_reason , t1.after_performance , t1.transform_way , t1.budget , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.net_value , t1.device_category , t1.created_by_person from (select * from assets_reconstruction_check t where t.ATTRIBUTE_01= #{bean.attribute01}) t1
or t1.ID =#{bean.id}
or t1.RECONSTRUCTION_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.reconstructionId}),'%')
or t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
or t1.CREATED_BY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByDept}),'%')
or t1.FORM_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.formState}),'%')

or t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
or t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')

or t1.OWNER_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerDept}),'%')
or t1.OWNER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerId}),'%')

or t1.DEVICE_SPEC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceSpec}),'%')
or t1.MANUFACTURER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.manufacturerId}),'%')
or t1.LIKA_DATE >= #{bean.likaDateBegin}
or t1.LIKA_DATE <= #{bean.likaDateEnd}
or t1.ORIGINAL_VALUE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.originalValue}),'%')
or t1.EXISTING_PERFORMANCE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.existingPerformance}),'%')
or t1.REFORMING_REASON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.reformingReason}),'%')
or t1.AFTER_PERFORMANCE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.afterPerformance}),'%')
or t1.TRANSFORM_WAY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.transformWay}),'%')
or t1.BUDGET like concat(concat('%',#{bean.budget}),'%')
or t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')

or t1.CREATED_BY_PERSON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByPerson}),'%')
order by ${pOrderBy}

select t1.id , t1.reconstruction_id , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.form_state , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.owner_dept , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_tel , t1.device_name , t1.secret_level , t1.unified_id , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.lika_date , t1.original_value , t1.existing_performance , t1.reforming_reason , t1.after_performance , t1.transform_way , t1.budget , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.net_value , t1.device_category , t1.created_by_person from assets_reconstruction_check t1 where t1.id = #{id}

id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
